item.title: Production behind schedule
item.description:
üúè Hey, everyone! üúè

We got to inform you that the production of the physicals (digipack) and the T-shirts are a bit behind schedule.

No worries, it’s on the way and we will send them out as soon as we got them.

Thanks for your patience!

item.title: The Glorification of Witchery merch presale has officially begun!
item.description:
Secure your preorder now ‚Äî shipments will commence on June 1, 2025.

T-shirts are available in all sizes, and we’re also planning to release a special bundle including both the shirt and the CD at a later date ‚Äî stay tuned!

item.title: Glorification of Witchery album release
item.description: On April 6, Fragda unveils¬†Glorification of Witchery, a full-length album that channels the ancient forces of Eastern European witchcraft through a bold fusion of black metal, modern death metal, and cinematic soundscapes. This is not just an album‚Äî it‚Äôs a ritual invocation, merging raw aggression with theatrical atmospheres and hypnotic intensity.

item.title: About Fragda
item.description:
Fragda is a Budapest, Hungary-based band that blends the extremity of modern death metal, the precision of deathcore, and the atmosphere of black metal into a distinct, oppressive sound. Their music is defined by fractured rhythms, tremolo-picked dissonance, and orchestral, cinematic arrangements ‚Äî often described by critics as a unique form of blackcore.

Custom-built seven-string baritone guitars in drop E tuning form the backbone of their sonic identity. Whammy-driven pitch shifts and dense, layered guitar tracks create a massive, overwhelming wall of sound that has become their hallmark.

Their music is defined by fractured rhythms, tremolo-picked dissonance, and orchestral, cinematic arrangements ‚Äî often described by critics as a unique form of blackcore.

Custom-built seven-string baritone guitars in drop E tuning form the backbone of their sonic identity. Whammy-driven pitch shifts and dense, layered guitar tracks create a massive, overwhelming wall of sound that has become their hallmark.
